TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {15717=Single ticket sales for PBT's 2015-2016 Season open Monday, August 24. To get your seats before they go on sale to the general public, subscribe today! , 10982=It is always a highlight of the season, and this year PBT’s Pointe in Time Ball promises to ascend to new heights. PBT is excited to celebrate its 2015-2016 Season with a theme that spotlights innovation in ballet. Please join us for Pointe in Time Ball: PBT Elevated on Saturday, November 7, in the Westin Hotel’s Grand Ballroom.  }
textBeforeTable: » « Monday, July 1 Touring Schedule PBT Merchandise Group Sales The Nutcracker - 2015 Presale 2015-2016 Season Subscriptions Read more about Man in Black, Eternal Idol, Jardin Aux Lilas (Lilac Garden) From stoicism to devotion, PBT dancers move through intriguing shades of emotion in a trio of ballets. In tribute to the enigmatic Johnny Cash, James Kudelka’s stirring Man in Black blends balletic grace and working-class grit in scenes inspired by six of Cash’s later hits. Passion prevails in Michael Smuin’s sensuous Eternal Idol, a tender pas de deux of sculptural lines and lithe
